titleStmt.title: The vvhole Psalter translated into English metre, which contayneth an hundreth and fifty Psalmes. The first quinquagene
Bible. O.T. Psalms. English. Parker.
titleStmt.author: Parker, Matthew, 1504-1575.
Tallis, Thomas, 1505 (ca.)-1585.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Iohn Daye, dwelling ouer Aldersgate, beneath S. Martyns. Cum gratia et priuilegio Regiæ Maiestatis, per decennium,

notesStmt.note: Translated by Matthew Parker, whose name appears in an acrostic before Psalm 119.
With four-part settings by Thomas Tallis.
Includes index and a final errata and colophon leaf.
The second and third quinquagenes have separate divisional titles.
The 6 pages after first p. 236 are numbered: 236, 237, 237, 238, 239, 240.
Reproduction of the original in Cambridge University Library.
